info.description: Validate ISSN's and ISSN-L's, and converts any ISSN to the correspondent (canonic) ISSN-L.
info.title: ISSN-L Resolver

tags.name: checkers
tags.description: Check format and/or existence of the string input.

tags.name: int-checkers
tags.description: Check format and/or existence of the integer input.

tags.name: converters
tags.description: Converts string input name to que requested output name.

tags.name: int-converters
tags.description: Converts integer input name to que requested output name.

tags.name: metadata-retriev
tags.description: basic information (metadata) retrieval by string input.

tags.name: int-metadata-retriev
tags.description: basic information (metadata) retrieval by integer input.

get.summary: Check that input is an ISSN-L.
get.description: Check that input is a Linking ISSN (an ISSN-L). The error 404 needs an updated database, to be an real "ISSN not exists".

404.description: has not found the input issn.

get.summary: Check that input is an ISSN (existis in the database).
get.description: Check that the Name (ISSN) exists, returning true. When input is out of range returns null, else the boolean false indicates "not found".

404.description: has not found the requested issn.

416.description: issn out of range (null, 0 or big)

get.summary: Check that input is an ISSN-L.
get.description: Check that input is a Linking ISSN (an ISSN-L). The error 404 needs an updated database, to be an real "ISSN not exists".

parameters.name: issn7
parameters.description: the first 7 digits of the ISSN code.

404.description: has not found the requested issn.

416.description: issn out of range (null, 0 or big)

get.summary: Check that input is an ISSN (existis in the database).
get.description: Check that the Name (ISSN) exists, returning true. When input is out of range returns null, else the boolean false indicates "not found".

parameters.name: issn7
parameters.description: the first 7 digits of the ISSN code.

404.description: has not found the requested issn.

416.description: issn out of range (null, 0 or big)

get.summary: Converts input ISSN code into its ISSN-L.
get.description: Converts commom ISSN input into a corresponding Linking ISSN (an ISSN-L).

404.description: has not found the input issn.

get.summary: Converts input ISSN code into all set of ISSNs grouped by its ISSN-L.
get.description: Converts commom ISSN input into a corresponding "group by ISSN-L" set of ISSNs.

404.description: has not found the input issn.
